section.heading: Length of service.
section.text: The length of service for grand and petit jurors shall be determined by the master jury plan. In any twenty-four month period an individual shall not be required to serve more than once as a grand or petit juror except as may be necessary by reason of the insufficiency of the master juror list or as ordered by the Court.

annoGroup.heading: Short Title
annoGroup.annotation: Short title: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 11-1901.
